snippet: Belarus advanced with a 3-2 win over Norway, while the United States edged Slovakia and Canada crushed Austria.
abstract: Belarus beats Norway, 3-2, to move on to quarterfinals of world hockey championship; other scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Belarus advanced with a 3-2 win over Norway, while the United States edged Slovakia and Canada crushed Austria.

headline.main: Belarus Makes Quarterfinals at World Hockey Championship
